snippet: The children of former President Alberto Fujimori of Peru, who is serving a prison sentence for human rights violations and corruption, requested on Wednesday for a pardon for their father.
abstract: Children of former Peruvian President Alberto Fujimori, who is serving prison sentence for human rights violations and corruption, submit request in Lima for a pardon for their father; say pardon is justified for medical reasons.
lead_paragraph: The children of former President Alberto Fujimori of Peru, who is serving a prison sentence for human rights violations and corruption, requested on Wednesday for a pardon for their father.

headline.seo: Fujimori Family Requests Pardon for Former Peruvian President

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
